alert.note: Alert for Whitman (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 26 at 3:49AM PST until December 28 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Washington... Paradise Creek at Moscow affecting Whitman and Latah Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 500 PM PST. && ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Paradise Creek at Moscow. * WHEN...From late tonight to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.2 feet, Water will be out of the creek at the intersection of Bridge Street and Hillcrest Drive and may also be flowing into the intersection at this stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM PST Monday the stage was 6.0 feet. - Heavy rain will arrive tonight and persist into Tuesday morning. The combination of runoff from rain and melting snow will cause significant rises on Paradise Creek. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late tonight. - Flood stage is 9.2 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
